Description: **Neon Blitz Racerback Tank** – yo this tank is straight-up ELECTRIC. Made with ZoomDry™ quad-stretch fabric that wicks sweat faster than you can say "GRWM", it’s feather-light and basically feels like wearing a TikTok filter IRL. Neon lime, hot magenta, and cyber purple colorways that glow under blacklight – perfect for late-night runs or popping off in the gym mirror. Cropped just right to show off your abs progress, with a strappy back that says "I do handstands for fun". Pair it with the matching biker shorts and watch your confidence hit 100%. Layer it under a hoodie for that effortless vibe or go solo for max glow-up. Anti-microbial so no funky smells after back-to-back classes. Gen Z approved, influencer obsessed – this is the tank that's gonna live in your rotation forever. Flex on 'em! 168 words

**Midnight Drift Oversized Hoodie** – the hoodie that broke the algorithm. Ultra-soft ZoomFleece™ with that buttery peach-skin finish, dropped shoulders, and a kangaroo pocket big enough for two phones + AirPods. Comes in washed black, ash gray, and limited "Galaxy Swirl" tie-dye that looks like you dipped it in space. Thumbholes? Obviously. Perfect for throwing on post-HIIT when it’s giving main character energy on campus. Size up for that borrowed-from-your-situationship vibe. Drawstring hood with metal tips for extra drip, and it's machine washable without losing shape. Ideal for chill days, study sesh, or when you're manifesting cozy era. Your timeline needs this energy – soft, oversized, unbeatable. 158 words

**HyperFlex 7/8 Leggings** – these leggings are UNFAIR. 4-way ZoomStretch™ so compressive it sculpts but still lets you hit box jumps like it’s nothing. Zero front seam = no camel toe drama, ever. Hidden waistband pocket for your ID and lip gloss. Colors: cherry bomb red, electric sapphire, and the viral "Matcha Latte" green that’s sold out 4 times. Squat-proof, chafe-proof, and cute enough to wear to brunch after crushing leg day. Your FYP is begging for these. High-rise waist sucks everything in smoothly, with mesh panels for ventilation on hot days. Dance, run, lounge – they do it all without rolling down. Hypebeast level comfort meets performance. 164 words

**ThunderBolt High-Top Kicks** – sneakers that make people stop mid-scroll. ZoomBounce™ midsole with 37% more energy return than your ex’s texts. Breathable knit upper in obsidian black, volt yellow, and the "Sunset Glitch" gradient that changes color in the light. Reflective lightning bolts on the sides so you stay glowing on night runs. Lace locks included because tying shoes is low-vibe. Cop these and your stride pics are going viral, guaranteed. Padded collar for ankle support, grippy outsole for street or court. Lightweight like clouds but durable for daily wear. Match with joggers or skirts – versatility on 100. Step up your shoe game now. 160 words

**VibeCheck Seamless Crop** – the top that lives in your laundry basket because you refuse to take it off. Second-skin ZoomSeamless™ fabric that’s literally softer than your emotional support hoodie. Ribbed underband keeps everything locked without digging in. Comes in 10 colorways but the "Cotton Candy Fade" and "Midnight Aurora" are selling out hourly. Perfect for Pilates, coffee runs, or when you need to look expensive on a $20 budget. Cropped length hits just right, with thumbholes in the long-sleeve version. Breathable, quick-dry, and tag-free for zero irritation. Layer or solo, it's giving effortless slay. Your mirror selfies are about to level up big time. 156 words

**AfterBurn Windbreaker** – for when the weather tries to cancel your hot girl walk. Ultra-light ZoomShield™ ripstop that blocks wind but still packs into its own pocket. Neon zippers, reflective piping, and that oversized fit that looks fire layered over any crop. Available in toxic green, infrared orange, and the "Holo Chrome" that shifts colors like your mood. Throw it on, pop in your AirPods, and suddenly the sidewalk is your runway. Adjustable hood and cuffs, vented back for breathability. Water-repellent coating handles light rain like a champ. Packable for festivals or travel – compact drip essential. Stay protected, stay stylish. 155 words

**PulseRush Sports Bra** – support level: Olympic gymnast. Double-layer ZoomCompress™ with removable cups and adjustable straps that actually stay put. Racerback design with cutouts that make your back look snatched. Colors drop weekly but the "Dragon Fruit" pink and "Cosmic Black" with holographic logo are currently trending #1 on fitness TikTok. Medium-to-high impact so you can go from burpees to brunch without a wardrobe change. Moisture-wicking lining keeps you cool, wide band for no-spill security. Mix and match with leggings for full sets. Confidence booster in bra form – own every move. 152 words

**GravityDefy Cargo Joggers** – joggers that broke the dress code. ZoomTech™ tapered fit with six pockets deep enough for your Stanley, phone, and post-workout snacks. Articulated knees for zero restriction when you’re doing TikTok dances in the parking lot. Available in olive, charcoal, and the limited "Cyber Camo" that’s already waitlisted. Cuff them or let them stack – either way you’re serving looks while running errands at 2x speed. Elastic waist with drawcord, reinforced seams for durability. Soft-brushed interior for all-day coziness. Streetwear meets athleisure perfection. Your casual fit just got an upgrade. 159 words

**GlowShift Bike Shorts** – 6-inch inseam of pure chaos. ZoomShine™ fabric with subtle reflective particles that light up in flash photos. Built-in brief liner so comfy you’ll forget it’s there. High waist with drawcord that actually works. Colors: ultraviolet, lava red, and the "Glacier Mint" that looks like you walked out of a freezer challenge. Perfect for spin class, skate park sessions, or when you need your booty to have its own area code. Anti-chafing flat seams, UPF 50+ for sun protection. Bold enough for statements, basic enough for layering. Cycle through your week in these. 157 words

**Eclipse Crew Socks** – the socks that started the ankle flex movement. ZoomCushion™ terry footbed with arch compression and that perfect 90s crew height. Each pack comes with three colorways: blackout, neon splatter, and the viral "Aura Glow" that changes color in the sun. Anti-slip silicone grip inside the cuff so they never slide into your sneakers. One size fits all vibes – throw them on with slides and suddenly your drip is unmatched. Moisture control keeps feet dry, reinforced heel/toe for longevity. Pair with any kicks for that pop. Sock game strong AF. 154 words

**Solar Flare Track Jacket** – jacket that's serving heatwave vibes. ZoomTrack™ lightweight nylon with full-zip front and stand-up collar for that retro runner look. Comes in solar orange, eclipse blue, and the "Pixel Burst" print that's exploding on Reels. Side pockets with zippers, elastic cuffs to lock in the fit. Breathable mesh lining vents heat during sprints. Throw over a tank for track meets or street hangs – instantly iconic. Reflective stripes for low-light safety. Your outer layer just went supernova. Glow and go! 153 words

**Lunar Glow Long Sleeve** – the tee that moonlights as magic. ZoomGlow™ fabric with subtle luminescent threads that shine under UV. Fitted but forgiving, thumbholes, and a slight crop for high-waist pairing. Colors: lunar silver, deep void black, and "Starry Night" speckle. Ideal for evening yoga or festival fits where you wanna sparkle without trying. Quick-dry, odor-resistant – wear it multiple times between washes. Soft like a dream, stretchy like your ambitions. Nighttime activities approved. Shine bright, babes. 151 words

**Velocity Sprint Shorts** – shorts built for speed demons. ZoomVelocity™ liner-free design with 4-inch inseam and split hems for unrestricted strides. Drawcord waist, zip back pocket for keys. In blaze yellow, turbo teal, and "Racer Stripe" side panels. Anti-bounce tech keeps everything secure during HIIT. Lightweight, wind-resistant – fly past the competition. Perfect for track, trails, or quick errands. Your legs deserve this freedom. Sprint into the spotlight. 150 words

**AeroMesh Performance Tee** – tee that's basically air. ZoomAero™ mesh panels everywhere for max ventilation on scorchers. Relaxed fit, anti-chafe seams, dropped tail for coverage. Colors: aero white, storm gray, and the "Tropical Punch" fade. UPF 30+ blocks rays, quick-dry for sweat sessions. Gym to street seamless transition. Logo hits that pop in photos. Stay cool, look hotter. Ventilation nation. 152 words

**Quantum Quilted Vest** – vest for layering legends. ZoomQuilt™ insulated but breathable, water-repellent shell. Stand collar, full zip, side pockets. In quantum purple, midnight navy, and "Iridescent Shift". Packable into pocket for travel. Warm without bulk – ideal for cool mornings or post-sweat chill. Add over hoodies for dimension. Your transitional piece hero. Quilted queen energy. 151 words

**Blitz Bomber Jacket** – bomber that's bombing the feeds. ZoomBlitz™ satin finish with ribbed cuffs and hem. Zip pockets, quilted lining for light warmth. Colors: blitz red, camo green, and holographic silver. Oversized fit for that cool kid aesthetic. Street style staple for fall vibes. Pair with crops or joggers. Bomb the timeline. 150 words

**FlexCore Compression Shorts** – shorts that hug like they mean it. ZoomCore™ high-compression for muscle support and recovery boost. 8-inch inseam, flatlock seams. In core black, flex blue, and "Vein Pop" print. Pocket for gels during runs. Reduce fatigue, enhance performance. Under armor or solo. Compression game changer. 153 words

**Radiant Run Cap** – cap that's capping off your fits perfectly. ZoomRadiant™ adjustable strap, moisture-wicking sweatband. Laser-cut vents, reflective logo. Colors: radiant pink, shadow black, and glow-in-dark brim. Curved bill for sun shade. Ponytail-friendly. Run, hike, vibe. Headwear essential. 150 words

**Surge Energy Backpack** – pack that surges with you. ZoomSurge™ water-resistant, laptop sleeve, multiple compartments. Padded straps, breathable back panel. In surge orange, electric black, and "Neon Grid". Side bottle pockets, hidden zip. School to gym seamless. Carry your world in style. 151 words

**Ignite Inferno Beanie** – beanie for fire heads. ZoomIgnite™ double-knit acrylic, fold-up cuff with logo. Stretch fit, warmth without itch. Colors: inferno red, ash smoke, and flame embroidery. Cold weather warrior for runs or hangs. Keep the heat in, style out. Beanie season unlocked. 152 words

**Vortex Hooded Tank** – tank with a twist. ZoomVortex™ hooded design for sun protection or mystery. Side slits, kangaroo pocket. In vortex teal, swirl gray, and tie-dye options. Lightweight, flowy for hot days. Beach to barre. Hooded hype. 150 words

**Nova Nebula Leggings** – leggings from another galaxy. ZoomNebula™ buttery-soft with cosmic print that shifts under light. High-waisted, 25" inseam, hidden pocket. Colors: nebula purple, starfield black, aurora burst. Squat-proof and silky enough to sleep in. Your legs just entered another dimension. 154 words

**Phantom Fade Slides** – recovery slides that ghosted the competition. ZoomCloud™ footbed with memory foam that molds to your feet. Grippy sole, waterproof. In phantom black, faded mint, and glow sole. Post-gym heaven or poolside flex. Step into comfort royalty. 151 words
